communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Telesforo Vazquez Mariscal
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

-Complete medical records for Telesforo Vazquez Mariscal during his time in detention at East Hidalgo Detention Center, La Villa, Texas

-Detainee death report for Telesforo Vazquez Mariscal (date of death 11/20/2020)

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Caroline Tracey

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Untitled
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Dear Sir/Ms,

I am a Norwegian journalist and author, requesting information under the US Freedom of Information Act. I understand that the documents I hereby request has been classified in the past. However, given the long time which has passed, it is my belief that these documents can now be released and read by the public.

The documents I seek are two agreements between the United States of America and Norway:
- U.S. Communications Intelligence agreement signed on 10 December 1954, and 
- a follow-up agreement the with the same two parties signed on 1 August 1979.

The two agreements are often referred to as the «NORUSA Pact».
I request the main agreement as well as the attached documents which follows these agreements. 


Kind regards,

Tarjei Leer-Salvesen
Solbergveien 3, 4615 Kristiansand, Norway
Phone +47 92429935
Email: tarjei@leer-salvesen.no

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tarjei Leer-Salvesen
